dialogue.htmlContent:
At the far end of the atrium, a long wooden counter has been set into the wall. A sign hanging above this opening reads 'Epona's Pregnancy Roulette', and, standing behind the desk, you see a brown-haired horse girl. As you approach, the horse-girl catches your eye, and, beckoning you over, she calls out, [epona.speech(Hey there! You got a moment?)]

Deciding to see what it is this she wants, you walk up to the counter, and as you come to a halt before her, the horse-girl beams at you in delight. [epona.speech(Hello there! I haven't seen you around here before. Are you interested in pregnancy at all? Y'know, getting knocked up, knocking some fertile sluts up, all that good stuff?)]

[pc.speech(Maybe. What's this about?)] you ask.

[epona.speech(Well, to keep it brief, the name's Epona, and I'm the one in charge of our special game, 'Pregnancy Roulette'!)] Epona happily explains. [epona.speech(Basically, if you pay the buy-in of ten thousand flames, you can join five other breeders in trying to knock a volunteer up, or, if you'd rather be the one to get preggers, you can put in the same buy-in and guess which of the six studs is gonna be the father of your kids!)]

You feel your heart start to race at the mention of getting bred, and, unable to contain your enthusiasm, you blurt out, [pc.speech(Yes! You mean this is a game about getting knocked up?! Can I have a go?)]

[epona.speech(Yeah, well, this is kind of the premium game here in the Gambling Den. But with a big buy-in comes the chance of a big reward! If you get a girl pregnant, you win double your money back! Oh, and if you're the one getting knocked up, and you guess the father correctly, you win fifty thousand flames! Just let me know if you're interested, or want me to go over the rules with you.)]

[pc.speech(Ok, thanks, Epona,)] you reply.

[epona.speech(Oh, and I almost forgot!)] Epona exclaims, [epona.speech(I've got a little customer loyalty thing going. Basically, each time you have a go at my game, I'll give you a stamp. Collect six stamps, and you can take me for a ride!)]
